parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for the below Scenario from Application Data Capture
Scenario: Verify whether the Exclusion Wordings are getting reflected or not if the member has exclusion PED.
2) Product Name: Aarogya Plus
3) Policy Plan:  Non Family Floater
4) Business Type: New Business
5) Members: 6A+2C= 8
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  :  
Self : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Diabetes
SPouse : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED= Hypertension
Father : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED= Single Other Impairment
mother in law : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Diabetes & hypertension
Father in law : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Dyslipidemia
Mother 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Sarcoidosis(D86.0-D86.9)
C1 : 16 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Anemia
C2 : 14 age ,SI : 2Lac,_PED=Avascular necrosis (osteonecrosis)(M 87 to M 87.9)
Take Decision for all member -> Accept with Exclusion

7)Trigger point: >member status should be accept with exclusion & at UWR decesion for all meber should be except with exclusion then exclusion wording should reflect.
8) VP:Exclusion wordings should get reflected on Medical rating screen based on PED selected
